Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: You should buy Lenovo, Better pricing upfront and on upgrades. Great warranty and very responsive.

Message.Title: From black Friday to cCyber Monday, spent $5100 on DELL products
Message.Msg: From black Friday to cCyber Monday, spent $5100 on DELL products for family members. Merry Xmas!

Topic.Title: Keep confined and unapproachable In Your Dell Inc. profits
Keep confined and unapproachable In Your Dell Inc. profits

Message.Msg: Bought @ 8.73 a share, then sold call option for 37 cents at 9... thinking I screwed myself now... but oh well, still made money...

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: Next time, do a reach around, you might get better results.

Message.Title: DELL has to be thinking to liquidate if HP rights its ship
Message.Msg: Seriously, if HP gets past the turmoil and becomes the enterprise market leader, then Dell is done.

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: I also got a hold for a unusual purchase.I called credit and they took off the hold after making sure I was the one making the buy.I tried to notify dell about the hold being lifted and someone that sounded like he was from India said he needed to transfer me to someone who could help me.After about a hour on hold I gave up! It appears dell does not want my business!
